ygData.subject: Re: basic installation question - cygwin and cantera
ygData.msgSnippet: The static libraries can be built using cygwin. I ve successfully done it. You need to follow the same way as if you build Cantera under linux.

The static libraries can be built using cygwin. I've successfully done
it. =
You need to follow the same way as if you build Cantera under linux.




--=
- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, "adam.weall" <adam_jw@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
